description:
Are you buying products from Chinese Factories?

If so, are you prepared for the next PERFECT STORM? Every year the Chinese factories close (yes lights out) for 1 entire week or more during the Chinese New Year and the all the factors of increased demand, workers not coming back and a backlog of shipments all setup for that PERFECT STORM that could devastate your business if you're not well prepared.

This course is based on a decade of product sourcing from China "Hands-on" experience and living through one of those PERFECT STORMS. Learn how best prepare your company and your inventory to minimize your risks and optimize your opportunity during this once a year situation.
title: Private Label Product Sourcing During the Chinese New Year
